backtype.storm.topology

Interface IRichBolt

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBolt, IComponent, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHBaseBolt, AbstractHdfsBolt, BaseRichBolt, BasicBoltExecutor, BatchBoltExecutor, BoltTracker, ClojureBolt, CoordinatedBolt, ExclamationTopology.ExclamationBolt, HBaseBolt, HBaseLookupBolt, HdfsBolt, JoinResult, KafkaBolt, KeyedFairBolt, PythonShellMetricsBolt, ReturnResults, RichShellBolt, RollingCountBolt, SequenceFileBolt, SingleJoinBolt, TestAggregatesCounter, TestEventOrderCheckBolt, TestGlobalCount, TestPlannerBolt, TransactionalSpoutBatchExecutor, TridentBoltExecutor, TupleCaptureBolt, WordCountTopology.SplitSentence, WordCountTopologyNode.SplitSentence

    public interface IRichBolt
extends IBolt, IComponent
    When writing topologies using Java, IRichBolt and IRichSpout are the main interfaces to use to implement components of the topology.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface backtype.storm.task.IBolt

        cleanup, execute, prepare

      • Methods inherited from interface backtype.storm.topology.IComponent

        declareOutputFields, getComponentConfiguration
